Author: ATB Coin
Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: Micropayments: Prepay and Postpay Models   Micropayments are defined as small online transactions. There are 3 models of such payments. Pay-as-you-go is considered to be a classic. There is also prepay and postpay models that have been created in order to solve the issues of the abovementioned model. Let’s have a look at the last two.  Prepay Customers are charged by merchants for a certain amount during a certain period of time. Those charges are transformed in a virtual currency that can then be used to purchase products from this merchant online. Customers can also purchase gift cards. Prepay method is often used to pay for newspapers, magazines, movies or games subscription monthly/yearly.  Pros and cons: + if you pay a large amount in advance in a single transaction the fee will be less rather than making payments every certain period. + with physical gift card users can choose how to pay if they don’t have credit or debit cards to use online  – a merchant should have a tracking system to monitor the amount that customer has on its hands – if gift cards are available in brick and mortar stores, merchants must pay to distribute them – users pay up front for access to everything whether they want it or not – Impulse buying is not preserved  Postpay Postpay model has a lot in common with a traditional online shopping – users pay after they decide to make a purchase. Merchant tracks user’s individual microtransactions, aggregate purchases and bill them as one amount. Postpay can also be used for the subscription.  Pros and cons: + users don’t need to make a large transaction to purchase products + aggregated payments usually reduce transaction fees + impulse buying is preserved  – a merchant should have a system to track user’s purchases and aggregate them – users may only buy one product and don’t get back to the store anymore – customers can only purchase products with credit or debit cards online

Author: ATB Coin
Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: ATB Coin Can Be the Next Standard of the Cryptocurrency   ATB tends to be the most reliable and convenient cryptocurrency for its users. The coin has 2 main characteristics that can make it the next standard in the crypto world.  1. Segregated witness  SegWit is a soft fork that allows transaction-producing software to separate transaction signatures from the part of the data in a transaction. It means that transactions are decreased in size and more of them can be included in one block.  2. Lightning network  Lightning network is a solution for those who want to make fast and frequent transactions between two people and not process each transaction through the blockchain as it takes a lot of time. Two parties set up a multi-signature wallet that holds some amount of coins. The wallet address is registered to the blockchain. The two parties can perform an unlimited number of transactions out of the blockchain. As soon as they close this channel, the transaction history will be registered on the blockchain.     In order to become a new standard, coins tend to solve the problems that the first cryptocurrency have. ATB coin already has the above-mentioned feature and can definitely claim for the title.

Author: brother3
Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: Proof of Work (PoW) VS Proof of Stake (PoS): which of them is used by ATB  In the cryptocurrency world, there are 2 main types of mining of cryptocurrencies, which are based on fundamentally opposite methods: Proof of Work (PoW) and Proof of Stake (PoS).  The principle of PoW is based on the fact that the miners compete among themselves, performing computational operations, and the chance of a block drop is proportional to the power involved, i.e. the weaker the PC, the less it is. When you mine cryptocurrency according to the PoS principle, the probability of a block drop is proportional to the amount of the coins of this cryptocurrency,which belongs to the miner, from their total number.  The advantages of Proof of Stake over Proof of Work include: · Much less need for resources in comparison with Proof-of-work · The impossibility of a classic attack of 51% due to the lack of power influence in the ranking · Even if an attacker concentrates 51% of all coins in his hands, the work of the blocking units will be broken, which will lead to the impossibility of gaining profit, not to mention that such an attack will be very expensive · Commissions in networks operating under the PoS principle are below than it is in Proof-of-Work .  The consensus mechanism Proof-of-Stake is a “cryptocurrency” brainchild invented to facilitate the lives of people who earn cryptocurrency. That is, this method of protection is invented purely for using it directly in cryptoworld. For the first time this idea was published on the BitcoinTalk forum in 2011 by the QuantumMechanic user, as an alternative to the Proof-of-Work used in Bitcoin blockchain. And already in 2012-2013, it has become widespread and is still used as the main method of mining cryptocurrencies.  Cryptocurrency ATB uses Proof-of-Stake in its algorithm, which makes it possible to minimize the cost of mining coins to a minimum.  https://atbcoin.com/proof-of-work-pow-vs-proof-of-stake-pos-which-of-them-is-used-by-atb/

Author: ATB Coin
Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: Security in the cryptocurrency world: what we should know   In the cryptocurrency world, there are several attacks cryptocurrency can suffer from. 51% of these threats are presented by monopoly problems and a double-spending attacks.  The most dangerous problem exists when one of the hosts possesses 51% or more computing power and gains a complete control over it. Such attacks usually occur in the POW-based cryptocurrencies only. When it happens, the swindler needs to buy some serious mining equipment which costs more than $15 billion. Though this sum may be considered very big, in fact it is doubled.  In ATB Coin network a 51% attack cannot happen. It is explained by the following reasons: As ATB Coin is a POS-based cryptocurrency, the hacker has to possess at least 51% of all network resources. He has to buy at least 25.5 million of ATB Coins. This quantity of ATB coins is 51% of the genesis block right after launch. Moreover, in case if such an attack occurs, the swindler won’t get any benefits. It will negatively influence the market rate of the cryptocurrency. It means that the hacker himself will suffer from damages.  Speaking about double-spending ataccs, it should be noted that in ATB Coin they are prevented. It is necessary to confirm every transaction. In order to consider the blockchain valid, appropriate confirmations should be made. Therefore, it is obligatory to make not less than 6 confirmations in this process.

Author: ATB Coin
Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: ATB Coin Key Features   ATB Coin is a cryptocurrency based on POS with the use of SegWit and Lightning Network protocols. These technologies provide the possibility to make fast and frequent transactions. The ecosystem of the coin is also powered by 3 key features:  ATB Wallet The wallet is available on PC, mobile (iOS, Android) and web-application. The app doesn’t take much space and is fast for use - there is no need to copy the full blockchain to use ATB Coin.  Power efficiency POW-based cryptocurrencies consume a lot of energy, while ATB Coin is based on POS protocol and doesn't require big capacities.  Cost efficiency ATB Coin doesn't require ASICs to use the coin. Thus, users save money on expensive equipment.     Coin holders are provided with a cost- and power-efficient cryptocurrency which can be used anytime and anywhere. Stay tuned for more news!

Author: ATB Coin
Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: ATB offers minimum risk and protection from the centralization   There are many rumors in the cryptocurrency community about the issue of coins and centralization. Exactly these two security issues cause the greatest concern among those who purchase cryptocurrency. Particularly vulnerable cryptocurrency is based on POS algorithm. The last thing the modern crypto holder wants is to face the inflation of coins.  The developers of ATB coins reduced the risk of inflation to a minimum. It was achieved because of a small amount of coins in the Genesis block. There will be 50 million coins in the Genesis block. A drop in remuneration for the solved block by 50% every two years is also provided. Such conditions are considered ideal for the emergence of new community members.  The second significant advantage of ATB is the solution of centralization problems. Moreover, the centralization of the cryptocurrency doesn’t depend on the algorithm of writing.  ATB creators found the optimal solution to protect their community from centralization. They used the deterministic randomization function for the next block in ATB Coin blockchain. These formulas are based on the size of the bet, the lowest hash values will limit the possibility of wealth accumulation, which means that the cryptocurrency will have never got centralization in this case.  As you can see, ATB creators did everything to make users not just feel safe, but really confident in the future.

Author: blockchainbits26
Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: With a starting balance of 500 coins in one wallet for the past month, with the computer staking basically 24 hours a day all week long, I received staking rewards basically once a week, with the values varying from as high as 95 coins to as low as 3 coins each time. ATB definitely feels more random than other POS coins I stake, as the others seem to have a specific block reward. Not complaining, as ATB seems to give better rewards than these other POS coins, but inflation is a concern in my opinion considering I made about 25% of my investment back in one month. Most POS suggest 3-5% inflation yearly so I'm a bit confused by ATB's rewards system, but the staking does work with a 500 coin stake. If you wanted rewards daily, I would think you'd need closer to 5,000 coins, but that's just an estimate of course.

Author: ATB Coin
Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: Hello, Shuman.  In the PoS algorithm there is no fixed volume of mining produced in one unit of time. In other words, it is not possible to calculate how much you will earn from 100 ATB per day or from 10,000 per month. I'll explain why. The point is that when consensus is reached by the PoS method, the opportunity to participate in the mining is distributed randomly (casually) between all the wallets in the network. No wallet or user can calculate in advance when exactly his/her wallet will be chosen for the mining of new coin. But despite this fact, there is a number of opportunities increasing the amount and chance of new coins being mined, I will list them below: 1. The volume of the stake held on the balance (the more is your share - the greater is the chance of getting mining) 2. The total amount of shares kept in all wallets of all network members (The smaller is the proportion of other network participants - the greater are the chances of getting mining) 3. Complexity at the current stage of mining. With increasing complexity, the volume of mined coins will be reduced. It will happen once in two years. Profitability is reduced by 50% 4. The period of the wallet being online. The more time your wallet is on the network, the greater are the chances of obtaining mining, because only wallets (nodes) supporting the network can participate in the mining (ones that take the information and synchronize with the single distributed registry - the blockchain). Observing all the above recommendations, you can increase your chances of getting mining, however, it is not possible to calculate mining in advance.

Author: ATB Coin
Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: There are a lot of awesome in ATB.  Lightning network:  1)Microtransactions with minimal commission 2)Lightning Network – a protocol allowing to optimize the payment process in the blockchain network, thanks to which the speed of transactions with any amounts significantly grows, while the size of commissions is noticeably reduced. Another element of the Lightning Network protocol is the multi-signature addresses. The Lightning Network often uses multi-signatures in the “2 of 2” scheme. To spend the crypto coins, stored at such an address, two signatures are required, generated with the help of two private keys. This mechanism maximizes network security.  SegWit:  1)Technology allows to increase the useful volume of the block up to 4 Mb. 2)SegWit is aimed to improve the network scaling by increasing the block size limit and decreasing the transaction processing time and fees, enhancing P2SH security to 256 bits, fixing transaction malleability enabling an array of smart contracts

Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: Venezuela Claims to Introduce Cryptocurrency as State Payment Method, ATB Coin Potential Solution    In the recent news, you could have read about the idea of cryptocurrency circulation at the state level discussed by the Venezuelan president, Nicolas Maduro. The government is planning to issue its own cryptocurrency, ‘Petro’. This is the first step for the countries under heavy US blockade to disrupt the present financial system and recover their own state economies. At ATB Coin, we would like to discuss the scenario of ATB Coin adoption by any of the countries and the use of our cryptocurrency at the state level. This transmission has numerous benefits for countries:  Firstly, a newborn blockchain paradigm could become the best choice at the governmental level and make up the deficiency in the financial sector of the country by making ATB Coin a national currency.  Secondly, ATB Coin could be a great solution for Venezuela’s economy as it is transparent, with no middlemen involved. It is a high-ranked and trusted unit of currency.  Thirdly, ATB Coin could be used to buy and sell all the necessary resources the state needs to prosper and flourish.  Fourthly, ATB Coin is a great new source to recover the state economy as the state debt taken in US dollars or Euros may be returned in cryptocurrency.  How could ATB Coin help Venezuelan Economy? The Venezuelan economy is at low ebb, yet the inflation is very high. ATB Coin has experience working with real sectors of the economy and we guarantee that could move their economy forward. We obtain ready-made solutions for small businesses that are already implemented in the financial sphere of some other countries.  The main benefit of ATB Coin is the anonymity of transactions. This feature helps to make payments bypassing the sanctions. Our digital currency could afford the access to all needed services, resources, and goods to every citizen.

Author: ATB Coin
Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: It's your own choice. Why are other users getting mining?  In the PoS algorithm there is no fixed volume of mining produced in one unit of time. In other words, it is not possible to calculate how much you will earn from 100 ATB per day or from 10,000 per month. I'll explain why. The point is that when consensus is reached by the PoS method, the opportunity to participate in the mining is distributed randomly (casually) between all the wallets in the network. No wallet or user can calculate in advance when exactly his/her wallet will be chosen for the mining of new coin. But despite this fact, there is a number of opportunities increasing the amount and chance of new coins being mined, I will list them below: 1. The volume of the stake held on the balance (the more is your share - the greater is the chance of getting mining) 2. The total amount of shares kept in all wallets of all network members (The smaller is the proportion of other network participants - the greater are the chances of getting mining) 3. Complexity at the current stage of mining. With increasing complexity, the volume of mined coins will be reduced. It will happen once in two years. Profitability is reduced by 50% 4. The period of the wallet being online. The more time your wallet is on the network, the greater are the chances of obtaining mining, because only wallets (nodes) supporting the network can participate in the mining (ones that take the information and synchronize with the single distributed registry - the blockchain). Observing all the above recommendations, you can increase your chances of getting mining, however, it is not possible to calculate mining in advance.  Wish you good luck!

Author: ATB Coin
Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: Lightning Network is Optimizing ATB Coin Wallet Transactions    ATB Coin is happy to adopt the Lightning Network technology to the needs of our users. The two versions for Mac and Linux are being tested now and we are actively working on the compatibility of Lightning Network technology with Windows.  At this stage, the start of the Lightning Network will be solved by adding a third-party solution called Eclair. At the moment, it is the most reliable version of the system. For the full operation of the Lightning Network, two applications will work simultaneously. ATB WALLET and Eclair. For more detailed instructions, please be on standby the next two weeks.       Lightning Network was developed to solve the scalability issues of the blockchain technology. Segwit is fighting this problem but the Lightning Protocol, operating as the superstructure over the blockchain, can actually speed up the transactions up to 1000s per second. One of the important factors is that there is no need to pay fees to incentivize the miners to verify your transaction first, so there is no double payment. The speed received, could enable the execution of instant payments no matter how loaded the channel is. Basic Requirements enabling the Operation of Lightning Protocol The blockchain state segment should be locked with the help of multi-signature or some kind of smart contract. All the participants should agree on that. The participants of the agreement sign the transactions among each other but don’t submit them to the miners. That’s how the interactions between the participants in the Lightning Network look like. When the transactions have been proceeded and form a set, this set is finally added to the blockchain.  Stay with us and enjoy blazing fast payments with ATB Coin!

Author: ATB Coin
Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: there is no technical problem from our side. Each wallet contains a set of: "private key - public key - address" (for one private key there is one public key and one address) The shares were placed at different addresses. Private keys from these addresses were distributed to users in their accounts. When a user imports a key to himself, he gets access to the balance and information about the transactions.  You had to protect your mail and your account using 2fa so that no one can access your account.  Return coins or cancel the transaction - there is no technical possibility. We warned earlier in the news about phishing sites https://atbcoin.com/1881-2/.  Someone has previously entered your key, and made an outgoing transaction, now when you use a private key - you see the transaction history. In the blocking system, you cannot cancel transactions. Please make the maximum security settings every time.

Author: ATB Coin
Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: What is your telegram nickname? We ll check it.  I wrote many times about PoS mining.  Quote from: ATB Coin on October 25, 2017, 09:01:50 AM  In the PoS algorithm there is no fixed volume of mining produced in one unit of time  No wallet or user can calculate in advance when exactly his/her wallet will be chosen for the mining of new coin. But despite this fact, there is a number of opportunities increasing the amount and chance of new coins being mined, I will list them below: 1. The volume of the stake held on the balance (the more is your share - the greater is the chance of getting mining) 2. The total amount of shares kept in all wallets of all network members (The smaller is the proportion of other network participants - the greater are the chances of getting mining) 3. Complexity at the current stage of mining. With increasing complexity, the volume of mined coins will be reduced. It will happen once in two years. Profitability is reduced by 50% 4. The period of the wallet being online. The more time your wallet is on the network, the greater are the chances of obtaining mining, because only wallets (nodes) supporting the network can participate in the mining (ones that take the information and synchronize with the single distributed registry - the blockchain).  Observing all the above recommendations, you can increase your chances of getting mining, however, it is not possible to calculate mining in advance.

Author: ATB Coin
Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: Study our thread please and you will see comments about succeed mining not only from newbie accounts.  In the PoS algorithm there is no fixed volume of mining produced in one unit of time  No wallet or user can calculate in advance when exactly his/her wallet will be chosen for the mining of new coin. But despite this fact, there is a number of opportunities increasing the amount and chance of new coins being mined, I will list them below: 1. Author: katalex
Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: Hello, I'd like to share my experience with ATB MINING. Since the installation of the test wallet I'm trying to figure out how this PoS mining works. I could mine some test coins with the test wallet and I'm mining some real coins with my real wallet now. This is what I have discovered so far.  1) Wallet balance and addresses First of all we need a basic understanding of the way addresses work inside the wallet. The balance of the wallet is the sum of the balances of the addresses contained in the wallet. If you want to check the addresses and the coin amounts for each address I suggest you to turn on the "coin control feature" (Settings/Options/Wallet/Enable coin control features), then go to the Send page and click on the "INPUTS..." button. There you have the list of all your addresses cointaining your balance, for each address you can see the amount it contains, the date when the address received that amount and the number of confirmations since that date. The number of confirmations equals the number of blocks generated in the ATB blockchain since the address received the amount. Since new blocks are generated approximately every 2,5 minutes, the confirmations number of the address is costantly rising. Keep in mind that addresses, amounts and confirmations are all stored in the blockchain, not in your wallet. If you keep the wallet close, the addresses and their amounts still "live" in the blockcahin and their confirmations continue rising, regardless of the wallet software (open or close). Every time you make a transaction, even if you move an amount from an address to itself, the receiving address is a new one and you will find a specific row (in the INPUTS... dialog talked before) of this new address and it will start from 0 confirmations.  2) Prepare for staking Ok we started from an address containing an amount of coins. When an address receives some coins it starts from 0 confirmations. Then the blocks are generated in the blockchain and the confirmations pile up "on your address". Well if you keep your address still (you don't move coins out from it) this address reaches the magic number of 2880 confirmations (approx 5 days of blocks). That is the time when your address is "mature". During "maturation" time you don't need to keep the wallet open, it matures "in the blockchain". This "mature" address is ready to "be picked" by the PoS system (that is what we try to accomplish). It "can" be picked, but that doesn't mean that it will be picked in a predictable time. It depends on some factors. Here it comes at help the console command "getstakinginfo" (Help/debug window/console/getstakinginfo command). If you are configured for mining and you have at least one "mature" address you will see:    "enabled": true (you are correctly configured for mining)    "staking": true (you have at least one mature-over 2880 confirmations address)    "weight": some number (this equals the total amount of your mature addresses) You are not still "staking", you are just "elegible" for staking.  3) Staking/mining If you are lucky, at some time one of your mature addresses is "picked" for staking. This is an automatic process that needs the wallet to be open, because the wallet has an active role in this process. Here what happens: In the Overview panel, under the labels "Available" and "Pending" appears a new label "Stake". On the right of the "Stake" label you can see the amount that was contained in the picked address plus the total amount of the mining (the coins that you gain as a reward). In the "Recent transaction" table you usually see 2 new transactions of the mined coins, the total mined amount is approximately divided in half between these two transactions. In the "transactions" panel you can see the same 2 transactions and, in the first column, you have a visual indicator of the time they will remain in "immature" state: From the moment of the "stake" (when your address is picked) the picked address is "frozen" for 481 confirmations (approx 20 hours) and so are the mined coins. When this time ends (481 confirmations) the staking ends and you will find that your original address is split in two new addresses, each containing half of the "stake". Let's make an example: Original address: 1000 coins Staking 1018 coins Mining transactions: 9 coins each End of staking: two different addresses, each containing 509 coins (in the end you gained 18 new coins) These new addresses will have an "age" of 481 confirmations when they become available in your wallet after the staking time. That means that the 2 new addresses are not ready to be picked again until they reach the magic number of 2880 confirmations.  4) Strategies for staking If you just keep your addresses still you will end having your coins split in two at every staking cycle. Is this the best strategy? Here is where you have the power of intervention: Decide how to split your coins in how many addresses. Since we are said that more coins we have and more is the chance to be picked, you need to decide if it's better to put all your money in a single address or if it's better to divide the amounts in more addressess of less value each. Of course it depends on how many coins you have in your balance. If you have a single address, when it is picked you will have to wait for other 5 days before it is mature again (and you will end up with 2 addresses containing half coins each). At that time you will have doubled the addressess, but halfed the amounts. If you keep different addresses with different coin age maybe as soon as a staking ends you already have a new address mature for staking (staking: true). My personal strategy at the moment is this (don't know if it's the best, but I'm testing it with satisfaction) I own 3000 coins I think a good amount for a single address to be picked "soon" is 1000 coins (based on my experience, at the current level of "staking power" of the network) I split the coins in 3 addresses of 1000 coins each (more on how to do this later) Once an address is picked by the PoS system I wait the staking time (481 blocks). As soon as the staking time ends I move the 2 split address back in one address of 1000 coins (I lose 481 confirmations, but I keep the amount that I think is good). Resetting the age of the address makes it available approx every 6 days, but since I have 3 different addresses I always have at least one address available for staking while the others "recycle". Approx every 2/3 days I expect to be picked, with an average of 3 stakes per week. If I had 7000 coins, I would divide them in 7 addresses (1000 coins each) and I would expect an average of one mining every day.  5) Controlling your addresses Remember when we enabled our "coin control feature"? Well it is what we need when we want to move amounts from specific addresses (we don't want the wallet to choose addresses with an old coin age, because we want them to be picked by the PoS system). So when I repack the "younger" split addresses after the stake, I choose that addresses from the "inputs" button and send the amount to a new address of mine.  Hope this helps and looking forward to hear your experiences and your staking strategies.  regards from katalex

Author: ATB Coin
Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: Hello, Johnnywelsh.  In the PoS algorithm there is no fixed volume of mining produced in one unit of time. In other words, it is not possible to calculate how much you will earn from 100 ATB per day or from 10,000 per month. I'll explain why. The point is that when consensus is reached by the PoS method, the opportunity to participate in the mining is distributed randomly (casually) between all the wallets in the network. No wallet or user can calculate in advance when exactly his/her wallet will be chosen for the mining of new coin. But despite this fact, there is a number of opportunities increasing the amount and chance of new coins being mined, I will list them below:  1. The volume of the stake held on the balance (the more is your share - the greater is the chance of getting mining) 2. The total amount of shares kept in all wallets of all network members (The smaller is the proportion of other network participants - the greater are the chances of getting mining) 3. Complexity at the current stage of mining. With increasing complexity, the volume of mined coins will be reduced. It will happen once in two years. Profitability is reduced by 50% 4. The period of the wallet being online. The more time your wallet is on the network, the greater are the chances of obtaining mining, because only wallets (nodes) supporting the network can participate in the mining (ones that take the information and synchronize with the single distributed registry - the blockchain).  Observing all the above recommendations, you can increase your chances of getting mining, however, it is not possible to calculate mining in advance.

This release is called the alpha version, though please be observant to some precautions when using the application:  – Do not transfer large amounts of ATB Coin and Bitcoin prior to the official release of the ATB Coin Wallet  – Do not pass the secret phrase obtained during registration to third-party users  – If you find any errors or bugs while using your mobile wallet, please report the case to our technical support. Afterwards it will be reviewed and fixed by our development team.  In order to receive the alpha version of the wallet, you should write an email to support@atbcoin.com specifying the topic “I want to try the alpha version of the wallet”.  How to install ATB Coin Wallet on your Android device:  1. Before you can install it on your phone. Go to Menu> Settings> Security> and check Unknown Sources to allow your phone to install apps from sources other than the Google Play Store.    2. Download the APK-file by clicking the link, which you will receive in a response letter from support@atbcoin.com. (As a reminder, this is the alpha version. It should be downloaded only for informational purposes. After the test has been completed, a stable version of the wallet will be available on Google Play)  3. Locate the APK application file in the file manager and click the “Install” button.

Author: ATB Coin
Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: Hello, John Cryp. Yes it's normal.The mining is distributed randomly (casually) between all the wallets in the network.  Quote from: ATB Coin on September 27, 2017, 12:41:15 PM there is a number of opportunities increasing the amount and chance of new coins being mined, I will list them below:  1. The volume of the stake held on the balance (the more is your share - the greater is the chance of getting mining) 2. The total amount of shares kept in all wallets of all network members (The smaller is the proportion of other network participants - the greater are the chances of getting mining) 3. Complexity at the current stage of mining. With increasing complexity, the volume of mined coins will be reduced. It will happen once in two years. Profitability is reduced by 50% 4. The period of the wallet being online. The more time your wallet is on the network, the greater are the chances of obtaining mining, because only wallets (nodes) supporting the network can participate in the mining (ones that take the information and synchronize with the single distributed registry - the blockchain).  Observing all the above recommendations, you can increase your chances of getting mining, however, it is not possible to calculate mining in advance.

Body: Quote from: Helios45 on September 29, 2017, 08:18:19 PM You're not alone, mining with my wallet open 24/7 for more than a week and no result  I'm starting to get tempted buy going ahead and dumping my coins to move over to something more serious Quote from: gsambolin on September 29, 2017, 11:15:23 PM ATB, I like most folks started very anxious with ATB but like most fading fast with ATB performance.  My coins have been staking since 9/21 - 24/7 and no rewards have arrived.  Here are the details;  1. Staking 24/7 since 9/21 2. 153 ATB's no mystery here 3. Wallet is open 4. Wallet is encrypted and unlocked 5. getstaking info shows    - enabled: true    - staking:  true  Is there a reason why staking rewards have NOT BEEN RECEIVED?  I know the generic answer, about random selection and what not but its time the ATB coin owners get the real answers.   Others have calculated block sizes and transactions and other stuff and by now everyone should have seen something.  Gsam  Hello  When consensus is reached by the PoS method, the opportunity to participate in the mining is distributed randomly (casually) between all the wallets in the network. No wallet or user can calculate in advance when exactly his/her wallet will be chosen for the mining of new coin. But despite this fact, there is a number of opportunities increasing the amount and chance of new coins being mined, I will list them below:  1. The volume of the stake held on the balance (the more is your share - the greater is the chance of getting mining) 2. The total amount of shares kept in all wallets of all network members (The smaller is the proportion of other network participants - the greater are the chances of getting mining) 3. Complexity at the current stage of mining. With increasing complexity, the volume of mined coins will be reduced. It will happen once in two years. Profitability is reduced by 50% 4. The period of the wallet being online. The more time your wallet is on the network, the greater are the chances of obtaining mining, because only wallets (nodes) supporting the network can participate in the mining (ones that take the information and synchronize with the single distributed registry - the blockchain).  Observing all the above recommendations, you can increase your chances of getting mining, however, it is not possible to calculate mining in advance.

Author: ATB Coin
Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: Hello,idonthaveanametoday. Are you sure that you entered your code once?  We had been working on your request for a share in your wallet and we want to report that there is no technical problem from our side. Each wallet contains a set of: "private key - public key - address" (for one private key there is one public key and one address) The shares were placed at different addresses. Private keys from these addresses were distributed to users in their accounts. When a user imports a key to himself, he gets access over the balance and information about the transactions.  You had t protect your mail and your account using 2fa so that no one can access to your account.  Return coins or cancel the transaction - there is no technical possibility. We warned earlier in the news about phishing sites https://atbcoin.com/1881-2/.  Someone has previously entered your key, and made an outgoing transaction, now when you use a private key - you see the transaction history. In the blocking system, you cannot cancel transactions. Please make the maximum security settings every time.

Author: gsambolin
Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: 1. Download the software on the new computer.  Do not bother with encrypting wallet or anything.  2. Rename the new wallet to old.  3. Backup your wallet from old computer and restore on new computer or use the restore option.  4. If your good with files you can copy everything over from the folder where the wallet is (which should include the block files as well) so you won't have to rebuild the block on the new computer.  I recently had a computer crash and was able to salvage my old C: drive and found all my wallet and block info in my  C:\users\[your user name]\appdata\atbcoin  folder.  Hope that helps Gsam

Author: delle54
Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: Well, you could also make a new install on the other computer, go to File > Moneyshare and enter your private key. You can have many copies of the wallet running, although it won't make mining faster. Your coins are in the blockchain and not in the wallet. The private key is stored in the wallet and is the access to your coins on the chain. Just like any other coin.

Author: ATB Coin
Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: Dear Investors,  Starting from today, we suspend the partnership with two crypto-exchanges: exrates.me and localtrade.pro in order to protect users from possible additional unforeseen expenses.  At the localtrade.pro exchange, as on any other crypto-exchange, there is a cash withdrawal commission. However, on this exchange, it accounts for 1-2%, which, in our opinion, is an overestimated commission. In the process of negotiations, representatives of localtrade.pro have so far refused to make concessions and lower the commission. For this reason, we decided to temporarily suspend the partnership until the final identification of the terms of cooperation.  In addition, there were problems at the exrates.me exchange with the input / output of funds. For this reason, until all mistakes are eliminated, we also temporarily suspend cooperation with this crypto-exchange.  We recommend the withdrawal of available ATB Coin funds, which are held on the balances of exrates.me and localtrade.pro within 2 days. For more information, please contact our technical support.  At the moment, negotiations are continuing with larger exchanges on the cryptocurrency market. Follow the news for the new announcements!

Author: ATB Coin
Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: Hello, lexusin It's not a traditional mining. In the PoS algorithm there is no fixed volume of mining produced in one unit of time. In other words, it is not possible to calculate how much you will earn from 100 ATB per day or from 10,000 per month. I'll explain why. The point is that when consensus is reached by the PoS method, the opportunity to participate in the mining is distributed randomly (casually) between all the wallets in the network. No wallet or user can calculate in advance when exactly his/her wallet will be chosen for the mining of new coin. But despite this fact, there is a number of opportunities increasing the amount and chance of new coins being mined, I will list them below: 1. The volume of the stake held on the balance (the more is your share - the greater is the chance of getting mining) 2. The total amount of shares kept in all wallets of all network members (The smaller is the proportion of other network participants - the greater are the chances of getting mining) 3. Complexity at the current stage of mining. With increasing complexity, the volume of mined coins will be reduced. It will happen once in two years. Profitability is reduced by 50% 4. The period of the wallet being online. The more time your wallet is on the network, the greater are the chances of obtaining mining, because only wallets (nodes) supporting the network can participate in the mining (ones that take the information and synchronize with the single distributed registry - the blockchain). Observing all the above recommendations, you can increase your chances of getting mining, however, it is not possible to calculate mining in advance.

Author: ATB Coin
Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: You can find the answer about transfering HERE Detailed instructions on how to download / delete your wallet are available in this section.  there is a number of opportunities increasing the amount and chance of new coins being mined, I will list them below: 1. The volume of the stake held on the balance (the more is your share - the greater is the chance of getting mining) 2. The total amount of shares kept in all wallets of all network members (The smaller is the proportion of other network participants - the greater are the chances of getting mining) 3. Complexity at the current stage of mining. With increasing complexity, the volume of mined coins will be reduced. It will happen once in two years. Profitability is reduced by 50% 4. The period of the wallet being online. The more time your wallet is on the network, the greater are the chances of obtaining mining, because only wallets (nodes) supporting the network can participate in the mining (ones that take the information and synchronize with the single distributed registry - the blockchain).

Body: ATBcoin support please respond! I have emailed over and over again about my coins. I keep on getting email responses saying that I gave my private key away. I did not. I invested my money into your company and i demand my money

Author: ATB Coin
Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: Hello,idonthaveanametoday. Support is already in touch with you.  Dear Customer! the purse contains a set of "private key - public key - address"  (for one private key there is one public key and one address) The shares were placed at different addresses. Private keys from these addresses were distributed to users.  When a user imports a key, he gets access to the balance and information about his transactions.  Accordingly, if someone imports the key for the first time and transfers the coins, then the next person who imports this key sees: - obtaining a share - Translation Thus, you see 2 transactions that were already committed earlier at this purse address, the one who had access to the wallet funds transferred the coins, you now see 2 of these transactions. Please remember, you just installed the purse only th time? Who has access to your account? who knew your private key? Please safely store your personal data!

Author: ATB Coin
Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: In the PoS algorithm there is no fixed volume of mining produced in one unit of time. In other words, it is not possible to calculate how much you will earn from 100 ATB per day or from 10,000 per month. I'll explain why. The point is that when consensus is reached by the PoS method, the opportunity to participate in the mining is distributed randomly (casually) between all the wallets in the network. No wallet or user can calculate in advance when exactly his/her wallet will be chosen for the mining of new coin. But despite this fact, there is a number of opportunities increasing the amount and chance of new coins being mined, I will list them below:  1. The volume of the stake held on the balance (the more is your share - the greater is the chance of getting mining) 2. The total amount of shares kept in all wallets of all network members (The smaller is the proportion of other network participants - the greater are the chances of getting mining) 3. Complexity at the current stage of mining. With increasing complexity, the volume of mined coins will be reduced. It will happen once in two years. Profitability is reduced by 50% 4. The period of the wallet being online. The more time your wallet is on the network, the greater are the chances of obtaining mining, because only wallets (nodes) supporting the network can participate in the mining (ones that take the information and synchronize with the single distributed registry - the blockchain). Observing all the above recommendations, you can increase your chances of getting mining, however, it is not possible to calculate mining in advance.

Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: Dear Investors!  14 September the conference CoinAlts Fund Symposium was held, in which representatives of ATB Coin took part. Herbert W. Hoover also found time in his busy schedule to meet with potential partners and find new contacts.  The event, devoted to blockchain technologies, gathered a lot of participants from different countries of the world, including representatives of large crypto-exchanges, financial organizations, and well-known international services, including:  Bitpay Coindesk Kraken Hedge Fund Alert Uber, etc  The conference provided all participants with the opportunity to receive a lot of valuable and relevant information about new projects, technologies, and the situation on the cryptocurrency market. During the informal part of the event, the representatives of the companies were able to exchange their own ideas, share their views on the products, services and technologies reviewed, with forecasts made within the official part, taking the advantage of opportunities to promote their products, expand the existing partner network by establishing new contacts, strengthen their positions, and form a positive image of their organization in the professional community.  The conference covered such issues as: Legal and operational issues for fund launches; Regulatory perspectives and considerations; Audit and tax issues for cryptocurrency managers; Institutional investment in altcoin funds; Cryptocurrencies as a new asset class.  Although the video recording was not allowed at the conference, ATB Coin team brought several photos for the report.      Please don't forget about our Telegram chat and Slack. Online support will help you with a pleasure!  Also you can add us by Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn, watch ATB Coin YouTube channel or visit our Website and view Whitepaper or legal documentation.

Author: RSA1
Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: Hi, ATB Coin.  Sorry, but I myself do not intend to offend you and someone else here. But, when yo wrote this: "If you can't understand how to use atbcoin wallet", this was irritating. We understand very well, how to use the wallet. But, you should be more honest with investors, who trusted money to ATB Coin company. If there is a bug in software, you should admit that and sorry for this bug. Moreover, that your team are going to correct this in next release.  I personally do not expect immediate "skyrocketing" of coin price. For example, it took 7 years for Bitcoin to get to the current position. And there were lots and lots of people, who lost the hope and sold or wasted away bitcoins during this time. It took almost 2 years for Ethereum to get to current position. I suppose, everyone understands, that investing in any Cryptocurrency is very high risk. But most people just think and expect to get income, and are not ready to accept losses. Sometimes this is like casino gambling, result is unpredictable.  I also see, that ATB Coin is committed to success and carry out aggressive marketing and promotion campaign. That was one of the reasons, I decided to take a risk and invest in ATB Coin. But the business model, you are using is not common for Cryptocurrency world. For example, usually, developer team is known. You use standard common commercial business model, which is usual in "Fiat" world.  ( Third-parties contractors, etc. )  And the way, as you answer here (just repeating the same phrases) also not good for the whole project.  In any case, good luck and wish the best.

Author: thph
Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: How to make staking work (windows)  Go to c:/user/YOURUSERNAME/AppData/Roaming/ATBCoinWallet create a file named "atbcoin.conf write into that file "staking = 1" Save the file Close the wallet if open open the wallet unlock the wallet in "Help" and "debugwindow" type "getstakinginfo"  if you see this your wallet is staking   11:15:24 ￼ getstakinginfo   11:15:24 ￼ {   "enabled": true,   "staking": true,   "errors": "",   "currentblocksize": 1000,   "currentblocktx": 0,   "pooledtx": 0,   "difficulty": 1.52587890625e-005,   "search-interval": 1,   "weight": 83527074247,   "netstakeweight": 229971832572789,   "expectedtime": 412989 }    Have fun

Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: ATB Coin Congratulates Users on Successful Network Launch!    Today, September 14th, the official blockchain launch of the decentralized ATB Coin cryptocurrency takes place, which is designed to become one of the fastest and technologically advanced digital currencies in the world!  ATB Coin team congratulates and sincerely expresses gratitude to all users, investors, and also those who participated in the development of the project in the early stages! As you know, for the first time the platform was presented at the presentation conference in New York on June 8th this year. Thanks to joint efforts, in just a short time the American project, ATB Coin has an ambitious mission (see Road Map) which has reached the world level.  Atbcoin.com administration reports that the site has already published a section with step-by-step instructions on how to transfer the balance to your ATB Coin personal account.  Detailed instructions on how to download / delete your wallet are available in this section.  A reminder that today, September 14, 2017, ATB Coin will participate in a conference on blockchain technologies – CoinAlts Fund Symposium which will be held in St. Petersburg. Regis Hotel, San Francisco, CA. Expanding to other near future plans on the project, ATB Coin will enter the world crypto-exchanges, where it will be possible to immediately start trading in cryptocurrencies, as for mobile applications, the wallets versions will soon be available on iOS and Android.  For all questions that interest you, in regard to any bugs when testing the network, contact technical support at atbcoin.com.  Please don't forget about our Telegram chat and Slack. Online support will help you with a pleasure!  Also you can add us by Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn, watch ATB Coin YouTube channel or visit our Website and view Whitepaper or legal documentation.

Author: ATB Coin
Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: Review of the ATB Coin Blockchain Genesis Block    Dear Investors & Cryptocurrency Users!  As previously reported, ATB Coin code review has been completed, and for that reason electronic wallets are ready for launch. The wallets will be available for download immediately after the network launch. The last phase we must accomplish for a successful transition to ATB Coin blockchain is the Genesis Block generation.  Our users are often asking why the generation process takes long and what exactly is required to get done.  The process of forming a genesis block takes time and any trustworthy company will not neglect this process. It affects the quality of network and ensures there are no bugs as well as provides reliable transactions in the future operations of the platform.  Importing information about initial investors to the block genesis  During the rapid development of ATB Coin and some case studies for the successful generation, developers need to import the balances of all investors to the genesis block. This process is carried out in the following stages:  Collection and data processing about investors from all the steps and sources; Identification of data on depositors who invested funds directly to the wallet without registering an account at ATBcoin.com; Defining personal accounts and one-time addresses that where used for the investment; Identification of investors who made their investments through exchanges.  Generating Private Keys  For all the investors, including those who transferred money using their accounts at ATB Coin website, private keys will be generated to load the wallet, create addresses for charge funds and save time to obtaining them. Thus, investors can independently import a private key into the wallet and receive their balance instantly, without waiting for a script to operate.  Network Operation  After generating the genesis block with the balances of all depositors, the last round of tests will be finalized by unit testing, and the system will start working by POW, which will last for a particular time and within this time balances will be transferred to the accounts of the users. Immediately after that, the consensus will automatically switch to PoS, the wallets will be updated on the site as well as GitHub code.  As previously reported, this process will end on September, 14. By this date, all users will be able to download wallet, compile a node locally and initiate Lightning transaction, check all the changes in the code.

Body: #ATBCoin #ATBCoinNews    Dear Investors!  We announce our participation in the conference CoinAlts Fund Symposium, dedicated to blockchain technologies! The event will be held on September 14, 2017 in St. Regis Hotel, San Francisco, CA.  The conference will cover the following issues: Legal and operational issues for fund launches; Regulatory perspectives and considerations; Audit and tax issues for cryptocurrency managers; Institutional investment in altcoin funds; Cryptocurrencies as a new asset class.  Co-Frieman & Mallon LLP, Arthur Bell, MG Stover & Co, Harneys act as sponsors of the CoinAlts Fund Symposium conference. Premium sponsors of the event: Greyline, Silvergate Bank, Kingdom Trust, Deloitte.  The cryptocurrency market demonstrates impressive growth and development; new promising players quickly occupy their niches in it. For the ATB Coin team, participation in the conference will be an opportunity to introduce ourselves and establish new contacts, as well as to take part in the discussion of the most pressing issues of the digital currency market and blockchain technologies. See you at the conference!  ATB Coin thanks each of the 9,247 investors for their support and trust. It is now that we create history and do it together! The network launch will be completed very soon and ATB Coin will be listed on the crypto-exchanges. Together with this, our investors will be able to access what everyone has been striving for – a new level of asset management and new financial opportunities. Positive changes are very close! Author: RSA1
Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: Well, seems these folks from ATB coin have not realized, that they can spend all collected money to lawyers and spend the rest of the life hiding somewhere in remote countries.  First of all, let's admit, that everyone, who invested in this project, made a mistake. One thing I would like to emphasize: If someone invested by mistake money, which he/she could afford to lose, this is not a big issue. We are all humans, but there are bugs also in machines. If someone borrowed money, (Bank loan, for exaplle) or spent all savings, this is reckless. In any case, life is going further. Second, if someone screams here, uses abusive words, indecent behavior - this will not help, even can make things worse. ( And in addition, such people only show their weakness ).  What should be done ?  I personally will wait several days. There is the reason to wait, I explain further. After several days, everyone, who believed this company and who are victims of fraud, should fill following forms:  https://www.sec.gov/oiea/Complaint.html  If someone knows another place, where we can declare such issues, you are welcome.  The more people fill this form, the more seriously it will be taken into consideration.   But I suggest not to rush now. The reason is, that this will be aparetn fraud, if a little bit longer period passed. Then SEC will look at it more seriously. But this in IMO, if someone else can say something, as I said, you are welcome.

Author: ATB Coin
Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: ATB Wallet will be Available in Android app Soon.    Dear Investors!  At the moment, the final testing of the ATB Wallet mobile version for Android will be conducted, which immediately after that, the announcement will be made and the Android-version will be available for download to our investors. In the near future, a version for iOS devices will be also released.  Note that the mobile version of the ATB Wallet on both major platforms – Android and IOS – contains a full range of functionality and benefits available to users of desktop Wallet including the ATB-code – a special service inside the ATB Coin wallets, containing a number of additional opportunities for using cryptocurrency, such as cold storage of coins and transfer of coins to users whose addresses are unknown to you. ATB-code is a modified analog of BTC-E codes. The underlying idea of codes was implemented on more reliable and modern protocols, and due to its own autonomous blockchain , ATB-code gets a wider scope.  We would like to remind you that currently the team is completing the preparatory work on launching the network. In the upcoming days, the network will work on the proof-of-work algorithm, which is necessary to extract the genesis of the block and will produce the first issue of coins. Once the block is found, the network will switch to proof-of-stake technology and official wallets of the working network will be available for download. From this point on, each investor will be able to receive the coins purchased earlier at his or her ATB address.  Please don't forget about our Telegram chat and Slack. Online support will help you with a pleasure!  Also you can add us by Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn, watch ATB Coin YouTube channel or visit our Website and view Whitepaper or legal documentation.

Body: ATB Coin is a one-of-a-kind blockchain-based cryptocurrency designed to deliver blazing fast, secure and near-zero cost payments to anyone in the world. It is designed to overcome well-known inefficiencies within government central banks and other cryptocurrencies. We believe everyone should be able to initiate transactions that are fully secure, private and anonymous. For that reason ATB Coin contains proven innovations that other coins have not been able to develop and incorporate. LinkedIn history discrepancy - Unable to validate team history prior to coin launch.  Instagram follower inflation - Average 7 day post likes <2% Follower count.  Community shill warning - New accounts detected with shill behaviour on bitcointalk.org.  Synopsis There is simply no need to invest in this coin, the creators of this coin offer nothing of substance to the crypto-community. Cheap marketing tactics designed to fool the average investor should be ignored. The video seen here shows the co-founder of the company discussing his business through a fake interview, we can clearly see this fellow is reading a script.  Archive.org also shows a historical snapshot of the website advertising their $2 Million R&D investment which has yielded nothing but a cheap reskinned BTC wallet which is still in beta. The ATB Coin Wallet software is not code signed, the Windows executable was created by an unknown publisher. No indication of development on a public blockchain testnet is available even though it was previously promised on their road map. Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: Blockchain Explorer ATB Coin Operates in Test Mode and Prepares for Transition into Blockchain System    Dear Users!  Insight ATB Coin, the resource for viewing statistical data on ATB Coin cryptocurrency transactions in the public domain, still operates in the test mode, but is preparing for the upcoming release.  At the moment, developers are transferring information from the investors’ balance sheets to the blockchain in order to improve the level of control over the exact distribution of purchased coins. After the information has been entered into the blockchain, then the working network will be launched, and cryptocurrency users will be able to monitor information on all financial transactions in the ATB Coin blockchain.  To view the statistics of the test network, follow the link insight.atbcoin.com  We remind you that official wallets of the working network will be available for download soon on the official website atbcoin.com. From this point on, each investor will be able to receive the coins purchased earlier at their ATB address.  Please don't forget about our Telegram chat and Slack. Author: ATB Coin
Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: Quote from: ATB Coin on September 01, 2017, 12:55:48 PM   Thank you for choosing ATB Coin!  Thanks to your support the project is rapidly growing. In this regard, we are able to have new partnership opportunities with major trading platforms.  Our goal is to provide all investors with a variety of the most qualitative choice of sites for further trade. After receiving ATB Coin to their accounts, investors will be able to start trading now on the following crypto-exchanges: dabtc.com, yobit.net, localtrade.pro, bitlocal.io.  This list will expand and in the near future we will announce the connection of the largest sites with which preliminary agreements have been reached. At the moment, we are coordinating legal formalities with our new partner.  Starting from today, the information about the balance sheets of investors will be transferred to the blockchain. This process will take several days due to the need for an increased level of control over the exact distribution of purchased coins. This is caused by the fact that in the first stage of the ICO there were several options for buying tokens and some investors contributed funds without first registering – for those users, the coins will be provided through the private key of the wallet by which the purchase was made.  After the information is entered in the blockchain, the working network will be launched. In a couple of days, the network will work under the proof of work algorithm, as it is necessary to extract the genesis of the block, which will produce the first issue of coins.  Once the block is found, the network will switch to the proof of stake technology and the official wallets of the working network will be available for download. From now on, each investor will be able to receive previously bought coins on his ATB address.  Due to the necessary time needed prepare the process, it has been decided to leave the investment opportunity for the whole period of the preparatory work. The cost of the token at the pre-launch stage will be 2.5 USD with the current discount remaining at 10%.  We also hastily aim to please investors who are waiting for mobile versions of applications. In a couple of days, the test versions for Android and IOS operating systems will be available on our website. The development team will make every effort to complete the work on the applications and release the final version of mobile wallets before the first issue of coins.  We thank all investors for their trust!  Please don't forget about our Telegram chat and Slack. Online support will help you with a pleasure!  Also you can add us by Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn, watch ATB Coin YouTube channel or visit our Website and view Whitepaper or legal documentation.

Body: #ATBCoin #ATBCoinNews    No, today we are not talking about one of the heroes of South Park  What’s about Token?  No, today we are not talking about one of the heroes of South Park. Digital tokens are used to implement three types of tasks: borrowing, selling shares, and monetizing an additional service for network users. You can buy or receive. Application Tokens – used to pay for internal network project services (access to advanced functionality, etc.). In some projects, digital tokens can be taken by completing tasks, in others – to earn only by mining.  Credit tokens are their main function of investing fiat funds in a crypto-currency project with high liquidity ratios.  Tokens-shares are the same tokens that are related to the ICO market. Token-shares coming on sale from the first days of ICO, become a source of seed funding. To investors, such tokens bring good dividends.  Some experts in the field of economics even tend to believe that the distribution of digital tokens should be classified as the issuance of cryptocurrency and securities. Author: Gandalf86
Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: By not keeping your hands on people's faith. Legit ICOs are a "one-step" procedure because once the funds are distributed across the blockchain, no single person can control it any more. That's the main point of blockchain technology, that it's trustless. In order to achieve this state, ALL legit ICOs run like this:  1. Collect the money 2. Emit the coins (in one step) 3. Optionally, burn the coins that haven been sold. Result: No way for the creator to scam, except by abandoning the project, in which case someone else could continue development.  You are failing on even two points, 2 and 3. You are only collecting money. But then you don't emit the coins in one step, but partially while it's already traded on exchanges (first way for you to scam). And, you also said you won't burn the unclaimed coins. Even worse, it will probably be more than 50% of all coins in a PoS system, which is total death to the concept of being trustless or decentralized. So, second way for you to scam. Almost a proof because you're selling something that doesn't really qualify as a "crypto currency" because it's centrally controlled by you, and always has been since its creation.  And of course, being completely intransparent and "we will only answer that question to you privately on Slack", no Block explorer, total supply is secret (??) etc. does not help improving the situation.

Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: BTW, very popular NEO coin. They issued 50 millions coins, but 50% are owned by the creators. And no one complains. So, only 25 millions will circulating in public blockchain and available for everybody.  There is also one serious issue with NEO: As a consensus NEO uses a simple BFT algorithm, which is commonly used in private blockchains. How such an algorithm can work on a public blockchains? ( Because it requires trusted nodes ). This is aceptable in a private blockchain, where the nodes are known, assigned from the outside and do not have the motivation to cheat the system, but in public lockouts, by default, it is considered that any node can be an unfair "player".  But everyone is happy with NEO and it continue to be very popular, trade volume is huge.

Author: RSA1
Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: So, I would let myself to make some conclusion, how I understood.   Pros:  - The basic idea is to create alternative and easy to use payment coin, understandable for all people. Whoever say whatever, but Bitcoin is still poor payment tool. Visa / Master Card can process millions transactions per second. I had many issues with Bitcoin, sometimes transactions stuck in the network for hours. And the worst thing is, that there is no centralized support, where to claim. Some advice as "ask miner to push transaction" seemed ridiculous for me. And also, "if you wish your transaction to be fast, pay more transaction fee to miners", not a good advise for ordinary people.  - So, next pros. If I understood correctly. Please, correct me if I am wrong. ATB coin will have centralized support, where users will be able to get help and, for example, fix "hanging transactions". This may be one of the biggest advantages, that may lead to success.  - Good and understandable interface. IMO, still most wallets are for geeks, not for ordinary users. There is big work is going now, many ICO, related to understandable wallets were in the past, but still, there is a lack of such tool If ATB coin manage to fix that, this is big plus  Cons:  - Not clear situation with smart contracts. How and if ATB Coin will support Smart Contracts, how to do programming, which programming language is used, etc.  - Not clear, who is developers of this coin. I DO hope, this was done by local USA contractors, work WAS NOT outsources to some garbage and cheap Indian IT company, ( like InfoSys ).  - Extremely tough competition. There are thousands of altcoins appear. So, ATB coin need A LOT of efforts for promotion in the market. An of course, functionality should be tested and free of bugs.   I may take a risk and invest some small amount to this project the time will show. In any case, this seems to be long-term project. But If I were wise enough and i invested at least 200 USD into Bitcoin in 2009...

Body: #ATBCoin #ATBCoinNews  BitShares (BTS) Payment System Has Been Added to ATB Coin Platform    Attention, dear Investors  In order to make investing as convenient as possible, we are gradually expanding the range of cryptocurrencies and today we have added BitShares cryptocurrency to the list of supported options.  BTS is a stable cryptocurrency, tied by market forces to basic fiat currencies (USD, EUR, CNY) or commodities such as gold or silver. Therefore, BitShares is an excellent form to provide a smart, stable currency derivative for sustainable investment.  In addition to BTS, ATB Coin supports 4 more popular payment methods, namely: BITCOIN, LITECOIN, ETHEREUM, ZCASH.  If you are interested in other payment methods or other cryptocurrencies, please contact our technical support chat at www.atbcoin.com. Your opinion is important to us!  Please note that when paying with BitShares, in order to identify the payment, one needs to specify the key in the comment field. If this key is not specified in the comment field, then we as the party will not be able to make payment of the ATB you have purchased.  Please don't forget about our Telegram chat and Slack. Author: ATB Coin
Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: #ATBCoin #ATBCoinNews  ATB Coin Appears at the IV International Blockchain Summit-2017    The two-day IV International Blockchain Summit is taking place on August 15-16 in Shanghai, being the top summit of the blockchain industry in China, and having attracted such large cross-border organizations as NASDAQ, Goldman Sachs, Citibank, Morgan Stanley, UBS, HSBC Bank, Barclays Bank and many others. ATB Coin, being a platinum sponsor of this event, took part in the summit together with invited popular companies.    The main topics of the summit have been the discussion of the political course in the blockchain industry, the investment environment, technological innovations, applied innovations and other relevant topics. Special attention was paid to the issues of policy interpretation with respect to innovations of fintech, the prospects for the development of the blockchain industry, the development of the technology, situation with the research of traditional industries on the use of blockchain, the position on investments in the industry, and the development of the digital assets.  Thanks to the use of such powerful blockchain technologies as Segregated Witness (SegWit), Lightning Network, Smart contracts, the young outstanding company ATB Coin attracted the attention of all large organizations. Being a professional digital crypto-exchange payment system, at the summit, ATB Coin showed extraordinary attractive force and advantages. ATB Coin became the only trading platform for digital currencies with a micro-payment function, which received an invitation to participate in the international blockchain summit.  As a well-known blockchain platform and digital currency in China, ATB Coin provides both Chinese and foreign investors with a good, safe, convenient and trustworthy trading environment.    If you are interested in digital currencies or you are an investor, we invite you to visit the official website of ATB Coin: atbcoin.com More useful information is coming soon!  Please don't forget about our Telegram chat and Slack. Online support will help you with a pleasure!  Also you can add us by Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn, watch ATB Coin YouTube channel or visit our Website and view Whitepaper or legal documentation.  Contact Email: info@atbcoin.com

Body: #ATBCoin #ATBCoinNews    Nvidia is riding high in midst of the boom in cryptocurrency mining, according to the graphics card (GPU) manufacturer. Nvidia CEO Jen-Hsun Huang struck a bullish tone about the prospects for selling to would-be miners: "Cryptocurrency and blockchain are here to stay. Over time, it will become quite large. It is very clear that new currencies will come to market. It’s also clear the GPU is fantastic at cryptography. The GPU is really quite well positioned." Huang's comments stand in contrast to those from rival GPU maker AMD, however. Last month, CEO Lisa Su indicated that the company doesn't see a long-term future for sales in the mining market. That aside, she indicated that her company would "continue to watch the developments" in the space.  Please don't forget about our Telegram chat and Slack. Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: #ATBCoin #ATBCoinNews  2nd stage of ICO starts!    Dear Investors,  As you know, ATB Coin accepted the invitation to participate in the 4th International Blockchain Summit-2017 in Shanghai (China).  Participation in this kind of event is with a large attendance, involving various number of ideas and a general enthusiasm for blockchain technology, providing a huge potential for its development. During the summit, we held many meetings and established new contacts for a future partnership with our Chinese colleagues.  One of the first joint projects will be cooperation with the popular Chinese crypto-exchange dabtc.com. Together with dabtc.com we will run the second stage of ICO!  The second stage of ICO will start on August 15th. Crowdsale of innovative technological cryptocurrency will last 15 days and will be implemented in three stages:    1st round: from August 15th to August 20th with a 20% bonus  2nd round: from August 20th to August 25th with a 10% bonus  3rd round: from August 25th to August 30th with a 5% bonus    Purchase of tokens is allowed at the ATB Coin website and at www.dabtc.com.  We remind you that the official blockchain network launch is scheduled for September 1st, 2017.  At the moment, the beta version of the wallet is available for the public to access, the main feature of which is ATB Codes. Other advantages of ATB Coin include the use of modern technologies such as Lightning Network and Segregated Witness. The main vector of ATB Coin development is the increasing introduction of micropayments into everyday life.  Please don't forget about our Telegram chat and Slack. Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: #ATBCoin #ATBCoinNews  First CryptocurrencyExchange Launching in Egypt    At the launch, the exchange will only support trading between the Egyptian pound and bitcoin. “The fees will be a fraction of the transaction size (<0.25%),” Khalil said. The company plans to add support for ether, other altcoins, as well as, other fiat currencies in the near future, followed by a payment service next year. The cryptocurrency ecosystem in Egypt is currently small with only a handful of traders listed on Localbitcoins. However, Khalil said “there are a few hundred people actively using and trading bitcoin on a daily basis in Egypt on online forums.” As for merchant adoption, he said it is “virtually non-existent,” noting that “people generally assume it’s taboo. We’re of course looking to change that outlook, and improve adoption.” Last week, Chairman of the Egyptian Financial Supervisory Authority (EFSA) Sherif Samy reiterated that digital currencies such as bitcoin and either not authorized or supervised by the authorities, according to local publications. With the absence of legal and loss protection, any dealings with them carry significant risks, the Chairman noted.  Please don't forget about our Telegram chat and Slack. Body: #ATBCoin #ATBCoinNews    Operating under the support of a number of law enforcement agencies of Great Britain, the research department of the N8 Policing Research Partnership proposed to amend the current legislation of the country on cryptocurrency. The report published last week mainly devoted to the review of cryptocurrencies and the challenges faced by law enforcement agencies when dealing with them. At the same time, as the authors of the paper admit, all these challenges are primarily caused by a lack of knowledge about the cryptocurrency. However, the most notable aspect was the proposal to the UK Ministry of Internal Affairs on changing the current legislation of the country in the classification of cryptocurrency. According to the authors of the report, the cryptocurrency shall be equated to the type of cash that will simplify its withdrawal in the course of investigative actions.
