Body: #ATBCoin #ATBCoinNews  Acceptance for Payment by BTC Resumed    ATB Coin resumed acceptance for payment by BTC, allowing users to purchase ATB tokens for Bitcoin at a safe level, informed the officials.  As previously reported, ATB Coin temporarily suspended the deposits of Bitcoin to the platform due to the activation stage of Bitcoin hard fork on August 1st. After the technical risks posed by the fork, such as the possibility of replay attacks, network instability, and other factors, have been thoroughly analyzed, ATB Coin confirms the network security.  Thus, this option allows all users to replenish their accounts in BTC and receive an equivalent to the ATB tokens to their accounts at the fastest and safest level. Securing customers’ funds is our top priority, the developers said.  As a reminder, you have also the opportunity to make investments in ATB Coin by using other payment methods, such as: Litecoin, Ethereum, and Zcash.  You are welcome to ask any questions and get know more about other payment methods or cryptocurrencies by contacting our technical support at atbcoin.com  Please don't forget about our Telegram chat and Slack. Author: ATB Coin
Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: #ATBCoin #ATBCoinNews  Generation Y Foresees Future in Cryptocurrency    The crisis of 2008 caused people to be more cautious in respect of securities, banks, insurance, investment companies, joint funds, etc., resulting in a drive of attention by the Americans towards cryptocurrencies, with a distinctive feature of decentralization. People saw the opportunity to secure a financially independent future through investments in cryptocurrencies, in particular, bitcoin and ethereum. Electronic wallets, therefore, are regarded as a depository of retirement savings.  Millennials, who saw the economic crisis in 2008, are now watching how anti-globalization populism undermines the stability of the world economy – and as a result, people tend to trust and choose alternative economic systems, instead of classical ones. Realizing the consequences of what is happening, the modern young people do not count on financial viability in the future.  Surprisingly, the cryptocurrencies with their own laws of the market, once thought to be “wild”, are now seen as a means of gaining financial independence and a foundation for a secure future. Investing in cryptocurrencies is gaining the momentum it deserves and is considered today a rational choice.  Teddy Wayne, a correspondent for The New York Times, stated during a survey on cryptocurrency, that the current young Americans, being aware of the instability of the economy and the uncertainty of their future, believe that the presence of a cryptocurrency in a digital wallet will protect them from fluctuations of various economic indicators. Student debts, housing, labor market instability, high competition – all this only exacerbates the situation.  According to the American correspondent, those who invest in the cryptocurrency are not afraid to be left without any pension. People prefer to keep their assets in electronic wallets, not in investment funds.  Difficult financial situation makes people live in the hope that someday the 100 dollars they have invested will become 100 million dollars. Similar luck was evidenced by those who invested in Bitcoin in 2010.  Among those people, there is an understanding that investing in cryptocurrencies will not bring instant enrichment. The acquisition of a digital currency is seen as a long-term investment that can provide a comfortable retirement.  Please don't forget about our Telegram chat and Slack. Author: Gandalf86
Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: Jeez. What amazes me the most is that there are still people who fall for shit like this.  POS means that someone just clicked a button to generate the coins, and now is asking for your moneyz. How can it have cloud mining, I thought it would be POS? If so, how do I mine? Sounds more like staking to me, and it doesn't add any value to the coins created in step 1. Who determines the price?! The guy who created the website?     This is hilarious What is the total coin supply?? Yes, 50 million created during ICO. But what is the current supply? Is there a max supply? Why is there no block explorer? Probably because it being a scam would be obvious then. 0.00042766 BTC/ATB at a coin supply of 50M would give a market cap of 76 million at ICO btw., which is still way too much for crap like this. Probably it is much bigger. Somewhere I read that there are ~300M ATB coins in existence, which would make an ICO market cap of $461 million. Do you really think that people will give you 461 million for nothing?!    Note that the website owner just decided that this is the current market cap, because he sets the price. This thing is not listed on any exchange. He's not even trying to make it look legit. Oh and he keeps selling coins even after the ICO has ended, and while POS is already running. Must be legit.    Seriously guys, come on. Even if your wallet displays a balance, there is nothing you could do with it. You've just sent your BTC and Ethereum to a newbie account who writes a lot of text. The only thing that confuses me is how you managed to keep this thread almost free of scam accusations, and only have unexperienced members praising it without having a moderated thread.    In previous threads there were some claims of it being scam, but oops - new thread!    See the prevous threads here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1959553.0 https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1962925.0

Author: richard7777777
Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: I don't think that senior members on this forum have the exclusive right to create a coin.   I'm a noob here,  attracted by the stunning amounts of money people invest in all kind of coins. The coins I bought explode in value, so I don't complain. But most 'old' coins don't work as smooth as promised. It should be cheaper (I payed $4,- transaction fee to transfer a small amount of money to an ICO.  (Especially people in Europe are used of very low to zero bank transfer fees).  So the argument of the 'established' coins that they are cheap, with no man in the middle fee, is BS...  IF ATB is really super fast and cheap, as they promise,  I don't mind if they are noobs on this forum.  This said, The introduction video is somewhat fishy. A guy named, Herbert William Hoover who showing off his wealth, while he's interviewed for about ATB Coin, don't make mei invest a single dollar in the project> But at least he's a real guy and not a faked name with a Stockphoto profile (Unless he created his profile till 20 years back , I just googled him).  ATBCoin probably also hired a poor marketing agency, who created a dozen of fake accounts to promote their coin on several fora. But I know a president of one of the largest countries in the world who did the same. Hiring such agency doesn't make you a scammer, but it's kind of fishy. The reason I invest a small amount in this coin is that the overall campaign looks good, they have a good and very easy working, Wallet, translated in many languages. And I'm a risk taker. I think this coin will be very big, but time will tell.

Author: ATB Coin
Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: #ATBCoin #ATBCoinNews  Sidereal Time in the Cryptocurrency World    The growing popularity of Bitcoin attracts a lot of attention. Especially against the background of regular fluctuations in its value and constant updating of its historical highs. As a result, more and more people are declaring their commitment to the first ever digital currency: from show business stars to elite representatives. However, the market has many other interesting cryptocurrencies.  Elite interest  In Hollywood, many stars have already become interested in cryptocurrencies. For example, actress Gwyneth Paltrow decided to help promote the payment bitcoin start-up services in the role of an adviser. In addition to Paltrow, the jury includes another Hollywood star Jessica Alba, as well as a hip-hop performer, Will.i.am, and investor Gary Vaynerchuk.  The famous American boxer, Floyd Mayweather is going to invest in ICO’s project of predictive analysis in markets (the platform that allows you to create collective forecasts for various events in the field of finance, politics, and sports). This is the first time a person from the sports world advertises the public placement of tokens.  One of the representatives of the famous Hoover family (descendants of Herbert Clark Hoover, the 31st President of the United States) Herbert W. Hoover,  co-founder of  ATBCOIN LLC., also decided to invest in cryptocurrencies. The object of his attention was the digital currency ATB Coin, which has a number of technological advantages over bitcoin. It is based on the principle of instant operations, embodied in the technology of Lightning Network, and SegWit. This allows you to speed up all transactions to the speed of operations in traditional electronic banking. In fact, they are performed instantly.  Well-known businessmen also keep up with the trend. British businessman Richard Branson took part in the closing of the round in financing the Series B of the popular bitcoin-wallet Blockchain. As a result, $40 million was raised. “Not long ago, we continued to finance this company, which creates an advanced bitcoin-wallet and takes the leading positions in this growing industry,” commented Mr. Branson.  Branson is sure that the Blockchain wallet will play a key role in the bitcoin system and can cause a radical change in the way people live in the world of finance and centralized institutions. “I’m not sure that someone knows exactly how new payment technologies will change the world in the long run. But I am certain that these technologies will have a great and positive impact, and this trip fascinates me” Branson added.  Renowned innovator Elon Musk also gave positive feedback on Bitcoin despite the fact that he considers it primarily a financial tool that will serve the black market. “I think that Bitcoin is still good … Bitcoin will be useful for both legal and illegal transactions,” says Musk.  Unlike Mask, one of the founders of Microsoft Corporation, Bill Gates, on the contrary, began to develop his own cryptocurrency. However, the cryptocurrency created by the Gates Foundation will differ in the absence of anonymity. “It is very important for us that criminals do not use our currency,” he stressed.  In general, Gates enthusiastically spoke about bitcoin, noting its convenience in global capital transfers for a minimum commission. “Most importantly, you do not need to be physically present in a bank or any similar institution,” Gates said.  It is noteworthy that Gates underlined bitcoin among currencies, including fiat money. Thus, he made it clear that the traditional money turnover will be gradually replaced by digital currencies.  Co-founder of Apple Computers, Steve Wozniak also bought bitcoin when the rate was about $ 700 for 1 BTC. Wozniak explained that he bought bitcoin not for the purpose of investing, but for playing and trying himself in the role of a seller and a buyer.  As we see, cryptocurrency becomes a part of our life. Perhaps before, only narrow-profile specialists and a small number of investors were interested in it, however now its becoming an integral part of the world economy and this is the best time for the formation of your personal financial well-being. Body: #ATBCoin #ATBCoinNews  ATB Coin Accepts Invitation to Participate in the International Blockchain Summit IV – 2017    2017 is a year of fast development of blockchain in China, and consequently it is the year of numerous appearances in various scenarios for blockchain technology. ATB Coin platform, the blockchain pioneer, along with the team of its main developers, received an invitation from the organizers to take part in the International Blockchain Summit IV – 2017, which will be held in Shanghai, August 14th-16th, 2017.  The summit upholds a high level reputation for the blockchain industry in China, attracting the attention of major cross-border organizations, including NASDAQ, Goldman Sachs, Citibank, Morgan Stanley, UBS, HSBC Bank, Barclays Bank, and others. Particularly, special attention given to blockchain projects with the top platform ATB Coin, as some analytical organizations believe that there will be a new period of high popularity with favorable conditions in the industry of the internet finance sector for 2017, and ultimately, the rise of the digital currency will become extremely revolutionary with blockchain technology, developing into a main basic technology.  The ATB Coin platform is a blockchain project, the central function allows for micropayments by digital currencies. It can deploy very powerful application functions in multiple areas of microtransactions. In both online payment and traditional investment or financial management, the ATB Coin platform can provide users with powerful guarantees and support through digital currencies. Proudly, ATB Coin is the only trading platform for digital currencies with a micro-payment function, which received an invitation to take part in this particular the event.  The summit will entertain the political course of the blockchain industry in the future, the prospects for investing in Internet finance and analysis of the current situation, the innovation of blockchain technology and other topics. The main discussion will be about ways to overcome the deplorable condition of the payment sector. It should be noted with certainty that among the tendencies of the development and use of financial funds around the world, the new economic trends in China, including the revolutionary changes brought by the technology and digital currencies will represent new chances and opportunities in payments, leading the industry of digital assets to also open new opportunities.  Successful use of blockchain by the ATB Coin platform has helped it achieve the highest level of popularity, attracting attention in the investment industry. As the site is being updated and developed, ATB Coin will adhere to innovations, tightly using blockchain, Lightning Network, cloud mining and other key technologies, all providing a powerful platform for working with instant micropayments. Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: #ATBCoin #ATBCoinNews  ATB Coin Mining Transferred to Cloud    ATB Coin network provides the opportunity for cloud mining. It opens up new prospects for those who want to make a profit, allowing one to earn without the working computer. The mining of digital currencies under the PoW principle requires large computing power. Therefore, the threshold for entering the mining market is often too high because of the increased cost of equipment and electricity. In the context of minimizing costs, the technology of cloud mining becomes especially relevant. It provides the opportunity to mine coins without any extra effort.  “ATB Coin relieves the user from the need to buy equipment for mining, and takes care of its maintenance, electricity costs, tuning and the Internet,” – stated ATB Coin developers.  The main advantage of mining using the cloud is that it allows you to collect a large number of users having the opportunity to invest in coins on different terms – from quarterly to yearly. This ensures a high rate of currency exchange operations with ATB Coin and leads to a more stable exchange rate. In turn, a stable rate reduces volatility to a minimum level and creates the prerequisites for the growth of investments in the digital currency produced in the cloud. Essentially, cloud mining is the investment. The whole process of mining takes place on remote servers and does not require additional costs. Currently, the technology of cloud mining is leading in the speed / productivity ratio. This prevents the user from many problems related to disruptions in the Internet connection and power grids, as well as,  the process of setting up and controlling the equipment.  “We have connected the cloud-mining service so that everyone can mine ATB,” –  cryptocurrency developers explained.  Decentralized cryptocurrency ATB Coin is a global project incorporating the most advanced technologies of the cryptocurrency market: Segregated Witness (SegWit) and Lightning Network. ATB Coin has a multi-level account security system and easy registration process. 24/7 online support for users and full transparency due to the open blockchain. Author: ATB Coin
Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: #ATBCoin #ATBCoinNews    Shortly after the appearance of information about the planned ATB Coin network launch in September this year, the development team announced the integration of the ATB Coin cryptocurrency with the Romanian network of payment terminals, ZebraPay.  To date, ATB Coin is in the process of forming a mutually beneficial cooperation with many world companies. One of them is ZebraPay, an Independent, Self-Service, Leading Kiosk Technology Provider. Currently, both companies have reached a preliminary agreement that the ATB Coin cryptocurrency will be integrated with ZebraPay.  Thus, in ZebraPay terminals, users will be able to exchange (or purchase) Romanian lei for ATB Coin (or vice versa) with a small commission depending on the exchange rate. Representatives of both companies believe that this service will help people solve their problems associated with buying cryptocurrency, and in particular, relieve users of the need to register on exchanges outside the country and open bank accounts for sending money to these exchanges. Specialists are also working on the possibility of adding ATB Coin as a means of payment for various services available in the ZebraPay payment terminals network. The service will be launched by the time of the release of ATB in September.  ZebraPay Main Info  According to Inc. 5000 Europe Ranking, ZebraPay had an astonishing grow of 983% in the last three years. In 2015, the company became market leader in the self-service kiosks industry, with over 1,900 terminals nationwide ZebraPay is also the sixth company in the regional ranking of Deloitte CE Technology Fast 50 2015 List and the first Romanian name on the record (998% growth rate), boosting Romania’s national presence.  ZebraPay is directly and securely connected with major telecom operators, public utilities suppliers, insurance brokers, online shops, and other vendors from different industries. In addition, being the the largest network of payment terminals in Romania, ZebraPay owns +2500 payment terminals in the country with +350 localities, +600,000 monthly transactions, +1000,000 daily visitors that help ATB Coin provide even more users of cryptocurrency with their services. Author: ATB Coin
Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: ATB Coin Connected to Lightning Network    The decentralized ATB Coin cryptocurrency uses the Lightning Network, making it possible to execute instant payments. The Lightning Network technology is a protocol-superstructure over the blockchain. It provides a number of advantages for users who operate with digital currencies based on the Lightning Network.  The technology creates special channels, connecting users directly. The information on the transactions carried out is not fixed on the blockchain, until one of the counterparties wants to “cash out” their funds, i.e. withdraw them from the Lightning Network channel. Due to this, the funds can be transmitted to each other instantly, which is impossible in the Bitcoin Unlimited software.  The main problem with the blockchain network is the limited number of transactions per unit of time. The transmission speed is significantly lower than the traditional payment system, such as Visa or Mastercard. With the further popularization of the blockchain, such speed will be a drawback preventing many potential investors from entering the bitcoin business.  At the same time, the creators of the Lightning Network provide an opportunity for users to pay each other via a chain of open channels. An intermediate user can ask for a commission regarding the transfer of funds, and the choice of the way in the future system can be automatically optimized in favor of lower fees.  “Lightning Network allows you to conduct transactions outside of the blockchain without delegating the right to dispose of the property. Thus, ATB Coin users are able to conduct an unlimited number of transactions between different devices at high speed”– emphasizes CEO, Edward Ng. Author: ATB Coin
Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: Segregated Witness: What is it all about?    The activation of Segregated Witness in the Bitcoin network remains one of the most discussed issues in the community today, which is scheduled for July 31st, 2017. The entire cryptocurrency world is anticipating the forthcoming changes and consequences, in spite of the fact that there are already existing examples, not only of successful activation of this technology, but also of the creation of modern new-generation coins based on it.  What is SegWit and why it is so widely discussed? Segregated Witness or SegWit is a block size optimization technology allowing you to solve the issues of block overflow, the speed of transaction confirmation, and the reduction of commissions. For the first time, SegWit was proposed by the Bitcoin Core development team, as a solution to the problems of the original structure, as well as, a better maintenance of higher scalability in Bitcoin. To put it simply, block size optimization involves extracting a transaction signature and placing it in a separate data structure. When a signature is deleted from a transaction, its size is significantly reduced. Therefore, each transaction is reduced by approximately 47%. Thus, the block, without changing its size, can hold almost twice as many transactions. Activation of SegWit also eliminates the problem of plasticity of transactions, creating conditions for increasing the speed of their confirmation (by implementing Segregated Witness together with the protocol called Lightning Network). In addition to the first cryptocurrency, the SegWit solution was also adopted by a number of altcoins based on Bitcoin code, that decided to resort to this method of network scaling as well. Now there are those who have moved from plans to actions. Unlike Bitcoin and other crypto-platforms, of whom only accept and execute a decision on the implementation of this technology, Segregated Witness in the ATB Coin system was laid by its developers initially. SegWit makes it possible to implement micropayments and use the Lightning Network technology, providing a mechanism for protecting against double waste and multi-signature. Regarding its technical functions, ATB Coin is not only a new alternative to Bitcoin, but it also has a chance to surpass it. A wide range of innovations such as SegWit, Lighting Network protocol, and Smart Contracts, gives ATB Coin the opportunity to expand its field of application and making it the most optimized and user-friendly system. Body: ATTENTION PLEASE: Bitcoin hard fork    Dear investors! As you know, we are pleased to announce the opportunity to invest in ATB Coin for both new users and those who have been following our project for a long time.  ATTENTION PLEASE! The Bitcoin network is approaching a hard-fork this Tuesday, on August 1. Ensuring the safety of customer funds is our top priority. In the ongoing event of a hard fork of the Bitcoin protocol, ATB Coin temporarily suspends the deposits of Bitcoin to our platform pending our assessment of the technical risks posed by the fork, such as the possibility of replay attacks, network instability, and other factors. Customers should take note that they should restrain from deposits of Bitcoin for a period of up to 24 hours or more following the fork.  During this period, you have the opportunity to make investments using other payment methods, namely: LITECOIN, ETHEREUM, ZCASH. Author: ATB Coin
Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: #ATBCoin #ATBCoinNews    The emergence of the blockchain protocol and cryptocurrency has solved the rather acute problem of microtransactions or micropayments – a business model in which access to the services or content provided, as well as low-cost purchases, is possible. Small amounts of transactions are unprofitable for electronic payment systems due to large transaction costs, whereas in cryptocurrencies it is very low and do not depend on the size of the transaction. Thus, with the advent of digital currencies, users are able to make micropayments and not spend large commissions on it.  Over time, Bitcoin, which was advertised not only as a cheaper alternative to bank cards, but a revolutionary monetary system, began to decline in terms of those long-awaited free transactions. Global scalability, increased fees, and constantly falling speed of transfers made Bitcoin practically useless for inexpensive massive micropayments. Yet to date, it’s still easier and cheaper for one to order a cup of coffee and pay in cash or by credit card.  Although Bitcoin’s innovative role in the development of the microtransaction industry is undeniable, some cryptocurrencies were inspired by their “progenitor” and began to develop much faster than itself, rather finer tuning the process with the introduction of new SegWit and Lightning Network technologies, allowing developers to create these new cryptocurrencies while meeting the requirements of micropayments, making it more feasible.  When developing ATB Coin, the team used all the capabilities of advanced technologies in order to create a safe and instant way of performing microtransactions by cryptocurrency users. The new standards of ATB Coin micropayments surpass Bitcoin and other altcoins in some aspects: instant transactions, minimum commissions, transparency, decentralization, flexibility, reliability, and efficiency. The combination of technological solutions on the ATB Coin platform enables users to perform any payment operations with a high speed, the size of each of which can be quite small with just a minimum fee, promising significant material benefits in the future.  Microtransactions, carried out in the online mode using cryptocurrency, have already formed a separate economic branch. Their development, initiated by Bitcoin, has become a new era for owners of various online sites with intellectual property, social networks, and mobile applications, as they allow to significantly increase the efficiency of monetizing online resources.  For example, the use of a micropayment system in a decentralized social network Steemit allows people to pay not only for all content but for every single post, comment or advice, replacing regular advertising and encouraging the author.  Furthermore, on popular streaming services, thanks to small fees, it is not necessary to subscribe to the entire channel: the user himself chooses the material (up to one video or track) that he needs, the price, and manages the whole process of the financial transaction from beginning to an end. Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: Hi, mankeen. Sorry,but I have no competence to solve this questions. Please write to info@atbcoin.com or visit support chat at our Website.  Please don't forget about our Telegram chat and Slack. Online support will help you with a pleasure!  Also you can add us by Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn, watch ATB Coin YouTube channel or visit our Website and view Whitepaper or legal documentation.  Contact Email: info@atbcoin.com    #ATBCoin #ATBCoinNews    ATB Codes is a service inside the ATB Coin wallets, which adds some new features to the storage and transfer of value. The first area of application of ATB Codes is the cold storage of coins. Any amount that you have on your balance can work as a code that can then be written on a piece of paper, printed on a printer, or simply photographed. In this form, you can store the code as long as you want. When it becomes necessary to use the ATB Code-one can open the wallet, enter the code, and the coins will reappear on balance. One can apply this to preserve the balance in the event of a temporary or permanent loss of access to the wallet. For example, if planning a long trip and unable to carry your wallet everywhere, just create an ATB Code with the required amount. You can use it anywhere from where there will be a PC device and Internet access available - shall it be an Internet cafe or a friendâ€™s computer, it doesnâ€™t matter! The code is something that is convenient to take with you and just use where itâ€™s needed.  The second area of application of ATB Code is the moment transfer. Users can send coins even to other users of whom the addresses are unknown. To do this, just generate the code and send it by email or even by SMS. The recipient imports the code to his / her wallet and the balance is instantly replenished by the appropriate amount.  Also, another good option is to use ATB Code inside smart contracts, when the final recipient is unknown, and it can be any user who fulfilled the terms of the contract. For example, for rendering any service or performing other actions required by the contract to receive payment. In this case, the person who fulfills the conditions will get a code that can be imported into his wallet - having received a corresponding increase in the balance by the amount indicated when creating the ATB Code. ATB Code is especially convenient for those who do not want to participate in trades on the exchange but still want to buy ATB Coin. ATB Code makes this process as easy as it gets.  ATB Code is a modified analog to a well-known BTC-E code. The underlying idea runs on more reliable and up-to-date protocols, and due to its own, autonomous blockchain, ATB Code has a wider scope.  The possibilities of ATB Code, as a technology, are truly large-scale. At the moment, there are quite a few exchange resources working with cryptocurrencies. Most of these services recognized the profitability, the ease of conversion and output of codes, as well as the security of such transactions. Making a general conclusion, we can firmly say that ATB Code is a fast and safe replenishment and withdrawal, allowing a convenient solution for both beginners and experienced users.  Ambitions - Actions - Results! ATB Coin is always one step ahead!  Please don't forget about our Telegram chat and Slack. Online support will help you with a pleasure!  Also you can add us by Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn, watch ATB Coin YouTube channel or visit our Website and view Whitepaper or legal documentation.  Contact Email: info@atbcoin.com

Author: ATB Coin
Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: #ATBCoin #ATBCoinNews  Swiss Government Plans To Legalize Cryptocurrencies    Cryptocurrency enthusiasts already know that Switzerland is a friendly place to digital currencies and the development of blockchain technology. We have become aware on July 12th that the legislative body of the country, the Federal Council of Switzerland, is preparing the basis for the regulation of the cryptocurrency turnover. For companies that are just starting their activities, there is a "sandbox" mode, in which supervision and control will be minimal. It is not necessary to receive a license if the turnover of a cryptocurrency company does not exceed 1 million Swiss francs (approximately $ 1 million). However, investors of such companies will not be able to receive compensation in case of a loss of the deposit. Simultaneously, with the development of cryptocurrency enterprises, the circulation of digital currencies will also be regulated. Legislators are still be working on their legal status in Switzerland. In the meantime, all new cryptocurrency enterprises are appearing in the country, and even the Swiss railways sell bitcoin at their ticket desks. Body: #ATBCoin #ATBCoinNews  Bitcoin Prank During the Janet Yellen Speech    Janet Yellen is the world's most influential financier, as she heads the US Federal Reserve and regulates the amount of dollars in circulation. During the speech of Yellen, witnessed under the US Congress, an unknown joker raised a poster with the inscription "Buy bitcoins", which was aired on all TV channels. CNBC correspondent, Steve Kopak immediately wrote about it on Twitter, after which the photo of Yellen and the poster in the background began to spread in all social networks. However, the Congressional Security Service did not appreciate the joke and asked the joker to leave the room immediately. Bloomberg showed another photo, in which the joker and his friend talk with security officers. Janet Yellen knows about Bitcoin, which she has already said in 2014 that she does not have the authority to control or regulate digital currencies. Author: ATB Coin
Title: ★★ ATB Coin - the world’s fastest and most secure cryptocurrency ★★
Body: Good day folks!  We are representing a brand new cryptocurrency, named ATB Coin. Please be interested in ATB Coin as we are going to win the hearts of cryptocurrency traders, miners and investors together with you.  We are currently finalizing the ICO stage, and we congratulate everyone with this significant step completion. With your help, we’ve raised more than enough money to become operable and to fine-tune our technology. We are delighted to announce the launch of the deployment process.  Right now as we speak, we are launching our test blockchain-network, and everyone is welcome to participate in bounty-hunting now. The open test and debugging will be performed until the necessary network performance results are obtained in the conditions of increasing load. Feel free to download and install ATB Wallet and receive your testing balance to the wallet.  We are creating ATB Coin for the community, and therefore we rely a lot on you. The Deployment Stage is dedicated to fine-tune and optimize for release the following:  - High-load and Big data DDOS protection, stress-testing, redundancy and network response optimizations  - ATB Wallets An array of lightweight and user-friendly wallets for Web, Desktop, iOS and Android  - Security and open testing We take your safety seriously. The only way to deliver good security is to perform a full-scale on-site and off-site analysis. We rely on you guys as well to eliminate vulnerabilities if any, potential threats and logical errors. Feel free to participate and get bounties for your assistance.  - SDK and API development We understand that no online business can exist today without a clear and stable use case. We shall prepare and deliver a full stack of integration solutions designed to fit the most popular online systems existing today as well as provide you with a clear and straightforward documentation.  Our official launch will take place on September 1, 2017, and by that time ATB Coin will be represented on the biggest cryptocurrency trade platforms.    At the moment, the project’s investors pool consist of thousands of people.  As you all know, the ATB Coin ICO token price is US$ 1,00. Right now we were granted an ICP license required to perform online operations in China. Following numerous requests from Chinese investors, we’ve agreed to raise the token price to US$ 1,50. We are grateful to all our ICO investors for their interest in ATB Coin and congratulate everyone with a 50% investment growth.    We create ATB Coin cryptocurrency using the most advanced technologies existing today – Lightning Network, SegWit as well as Smart Contracts.  ATB Coin is a balanced Proof-Of-Stake cryptocurrency that makes POS concept even more efficient, flexible, and agile due to a fully custom implementation of SegWit technology.  ATB Coin uses several cryptographic algorithms for the safety of its users’ coins:  The first one is ECDSA, a public key cryptography algorithm, which is associated with every coin in the system exercising a public key, private key, and signature so that every node of the blockchain can verify the coin ownership.  The second one is already good-known SHA-256 encryption algorithm and is considered to be the gold-standard in the majority of the world’s cryptocurrencies.  Thanks to the usage of SegWit that implements approximately a four-time increase in the block size. Every block in ATB Coin will be generated in 2.5 minutes against 10 minutes in POW based cryptocurrencies.  The main ATB Coin advantages are as follows:  - Multi-level security system;  - Highest degree of account protection;  - Full transparency;  - Open blockchain;  - Near-zero commissions;  - Instantaneous speed of operations;  - Creation of codes for transferring and storage of ATB by analogy of BTC-E codes.  These are just some of the possibilities of applying the technology to the practice provided by us! We are pleased to launch the next stage in the evolution of cryptocurrency. Join the ATB Coin community, moving with us will lead you to the future!  If you have any questions please don't forget about our Telegram chat and Slack. Online support will help you with a pleasure!  Also you can add us by Facebook,Twitter,Instagram,LinkedIn,watch ATB Coin YouTube channel or visit our Website and view Whitepaper.  Contact Email: info@atbcoin.com

Body: #ATBCoin #ATBCoinNews    On June 22 and 23 was held the 4-th international conference of Europol (EU police). The theme of the conference is digital currencies. The venue is the headquarters of Europol (Hague, Netherlands). The conference considered the legalization of digital currencies in the EU and its possible consequences. The purpose of the conference was to strengthen the fight against money laundering and the financing of criminal transactions. In addition to policemen more than 150 specialists from different fields took part in the event. Among them were representatives of Bitcoin.de, Bitfinex, Bitpanda, Bitonic, Bitstamp, Bitpay, Coinbase, Cubits, Localbitcoins, Spectrocoin and Xapo. Following the results of the conference, a statement was issued that the participants increased their knowledge of the methods that criminals use and how they can be countered.
